review_text: These headphones are amazing! Crystal clear sound quality and very comfortable to wear for long periods.
Battery life could be better. They die after about 6 hours of use.
Great product for the price. Highly recommend!
The fitness tracking is inaccurate. Steps don't match my actual walking.
Love the design and the battery lasts for days!
Screen is too small and hard to read in sunlight.
Best coffee maker I've ever owned. Makes perfect coffee every time.
It's okay but nothing special. Just an average coffee maker.
Stopped working after 2 months. Very disappointed.
Sturdy and well-built. Really helps with my posture.
Good value for money but the rubber pads came off quickly.
Perfect height and angle for my setup. Very satisfied.
Sound quality is terrible for the price. Very tinny.
Amazing bass and crystal clear highs. Worth every penny!
Decent speaker but the Bluetooth connection keeps dropping.
